author: jeastman
msg: MAHOUT-479:  Extended ClusterClassifier, ClusterPolicy(s) and ClusterIterator to support Fuzzy K-Means. Updated display examples to use the Cluster Iterator by default to illustrate these changes. Not quite as elegant as the earlier version but still a productive direction for exploration.
